mapper.insert: insert into cart(username, brandNum, productNum, optionNum, amount, validity, isBundled, isFree) values(#{username}, #{brandNum}, #{productNum}, #{optionNum}, #{amount}, #{validity}, #{isBundled}, #{isFree})
mapper.delete: delete cart where productNum=#{productNum} and username=#{username}
mapper.update: update cart set optionNum=#{optionNum}, amount=#{amount}, validity=#{validity}, isBundled=#{isBundled}, isFree=#{isFree} where productNum=#{productNum} and username=#{username}
